title: Issue when running elizaos start on Windows (Node/NVM v23.3)
body:
Hi, I've been trying to install and run ElizaOS from the client, but when I execute the elizaos start command, the process gets stuck and throws some errors.

My setup is:
OS: Windows
Node.js: v23.3 (installed via NVM)

I've attached the error message below (or in a file, if applicable).
I’ve already tried reinstalling dependencies and restarting the environment, but the issue persists.
Has anyone else experienced this or knows how to fix it?

Thanks in advance!

Steps to Reproduce:
Install ElizaOS client on Windows

Run `elizaos start`

The process freezes and throws the attached error




Observed Error:
`G:\DEVELOP\PRUEBAS\V1>elizaos start

comments.author: github-actions
comments.body: Hello @urgarcia! Welcome to the elizaOS community. Thank you for opening your first issue; we appreciate your contribution. You are now an elizaOS contributor!
